<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An interface for accessing data in a stream-like format, but which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// discourages copying.  Instead of specifying a buffer in which to copy</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// data on a read, the API returns an ArrayRef to data owned by the stream&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implementation.  Since implementations may not necessarily store data in a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// single contiguous buffer (or even in memory at all), in such cases a it may</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be necessary for an implementation to cache such a buffer so that it can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream">BinaryStream</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A BinaryStream which can be read from as well as written to.  Note</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that writing to a BinaryStream always necessitates copying from the input</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// buffer to the stream&#39;s backing store.  Streams are assumed to be buffered</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">/// so that to be portable it is necessary to call commit() on the stream when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all data has been written.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/writablebinarystream"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/writablebinarystream">WritableBinaryStream</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream">BinaryStream</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Attempt to write the given bytes into the stream at the desired</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// offset. This will always necessitate a copy.  Cannot shrink or grow the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// stream, only writes into existing allocated space.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/writablebinarystream/#a815a7df4e61a61d9ef36e21867f17fe4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/writablebinarystream/#a815a7df4e61a61d9ef36e21867f17fe4">writeBytes</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>) = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
